pkgmetadata.longdescription: git clone https://github.com/aforren1/pystatslib --recursiveExample usage:```pythonimport statslib as slimport numpy as npimport matplotlib.pyplot as pltfrom scipy.stats import normx = np.linspace(-3, 3, num=100)y = sl.dnorm(x, mu=0, sigma=1, log=False)y2 = norm.pdf(x, loc=0, scale=1)plt.plot(x, y - y2)plt.show()```
